short_summary: Financial Consumer Agency of Canada is seeking
description: This is a request for a consulting service
duration_in_months: This requirement is open for a period of six (6) months plus up to six (6) one (1) month option periods.
full_summary:
# TSPS – Evaluation Services Consultant

## Description

The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) is soliciting proposals from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders for the provision of evaluation services for its Information Management Program. This procurement is open to SA Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS/ZT who have qualified under Tier 1 for the Evaluation Services Consultant Stream.

## Requirement Description

The selected SA Holder will provide evaluation services to assess the effectiveness and efficiency of the FCAC's Information Management Program. The scope of work includes a review of program documentation, interviews with stakeholders, and the preparation of a comprehensive evaluation report.

## Selection Criteria

The selection criteria for this procurement are based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The top five (5) SA Holders who meet the pre-qualification criteria will be invited to submit a proposal.

## Contract Details

* Contract period: From the date of contract award to June 28, 2024, with up to six (6) one-month option periods.
* Estimated level of effort: 120 days.
* Trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Supporting Documents

* Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
* Proposed contract documents

## How to participate

To be considered for this procurement, SA Holders must respond to the Invitation to Bid (ITB) issued by the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada. Interested parties should contact the Contracting Authority, Pavlo Kyryakov, at (613) 290-2003 or FCAC.Contract-Contrat.ACFC@fcac-acfc.gc.ca to request an invitation to bid.

### Contracting Information

* Contracting Authority: Financial Consumer Agency of Canada
* Contact Person: Pavlo Kyryakov
* Phone Number: (613) 290-2003
* Email: FCAC.Contract-Contrat.ACFC@fcac-acfc.gc.ca
* Postal Address: 427 Laurier Avenue W, Suite 500, Ottawa, ON K1R 1B9
